alert.note: Alert for Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:24PM EDT until March 26 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... Cass River At Frankenmuth affecting Saginaw County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cass River At Frankenmuth. * WHEN...From late tonight to Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 17.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Impact...At 17.0 feet, The river begins to overflow its banks in places, flooding adjacent low lands. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
